'''Saurian's Might''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Saurian's Might is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest after completing the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[How Long Must We Wait, My Friend?]]''
